[[inst_hl_sdi_upr]]
==== HL.SDI.UPR

*Syntax:* hl.sdi.upr SrcD, [SrcR, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sdi_upr.svg[HL.SDI.UPR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PRE_INDEX
